title: Recreational open space may be permitted on Podium subject to regulation No
clause_text: Recreational open space may be permitted on Podium subject to regulation No.3.4.1(iii). The structure mentioned in Regulation No.3.4.7 may be permitted over the podium on which recreational open space is provided, subject to 15% area of such recreational open space.
section: Ramp to basements and upper storeys for vehicles

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
